attributes.action: Make Late Payments Within The Construction Industry Against The Law
attributes.background: I own the Lionheart Group, a construction agency, I’m constantly chasing my funds past 30,60,90 & even 120 days! It’s effecting our industry in an extremely negative way, people are losing their livelihoods through no fault of their own & we need to come together to put a stop to it once & for all!

rejection.details:
We understand that you are concerned about late payments in the construction industry but we aren't sure how you would like the law changed.

The law already states that a payment is late if it is later than 30 days (assuming no other period has been agreed):

https://www.gov.uk/late-commercial-payments-interest-debt-recovery

You could start a new petition setting out clearly how you would like the law changed.
